It‚Äôs time for the president to stop playing politics with people‚Äôs lives and reopen the government. This has to end.

Because of the shutdown, nearly 248,000 veterans have no guarantee of pay ‚Äì many of whom joined the federal workforce to continue the service they began in the military. This is an insult to their patriotism and the sacrifices they‚Äôve made to keep our country safe.

With no telling when they‚Äôll receive a paycheck, many TSA officers have had to resign so they can pursue other jobs to pay for rent and child care. While Trump stokes fear about the crisis at the border, he‚Äôs created a real security risk at transit hubs across the country.

The FDA has stopped inspecting food for salmonella, E. coli and listeria. The EPA is unable to monitor dangerous chemicals and pollutants. And the only way these agencies can resume protecting our health and safety is to force their employees to work without pay.

The consequences of President Trump‚Äôs shutdown touch every corner of our country. It‚Äôs forced hundreds of thousands of workers to grapple with economic hardship. It‚Äôs left federal agencies unable to perform the functions that protect American lives.
